psalm.title: Psalms
psalm.text:
[[Ps 128,1]]Blessed are you who fear the LORD, 
who walk in his ways!
[[Ps 128,2]]For you shall eat the fruit of your handiwork; 
blessed shall you be, and favored.

[[Ps 128,3]]Your wife shall be like a fruitful vine 
in the recesses of your home; 
Your children like olive plants 
around your table.

[[Ps 128,4]]Behold, thus is the man blessed 
who fears the LORD.
[[Ps 128,5]]The LORD bless you from Zion: 
may you see the prosperity of Jerusalem 
all the days of your life.

gospel.title: Holy Gospel of Jesus Christ according to Saint Luke
gospel.text:
[[Lc 13,18]]Jesus said, â€œWhat is the Kingdom of God like? To what can I compare it?
[[Lc 13,19]]It is like a mustard seed that a person took and planted in the garden. When it was fully grown, it became a large bush and 'the birds of the sky dwelt in its branches.'"
[[Lc 13,20]]Again he said, "To what shall I compare the kingdom of God?
[[Lc 13,21]]It is like yeast that a woman took and mixed in with three measures of wheat flour until the whole batch of dough was leavened."

first_reading.title: Letter to the Ephesians
first_reading.text:
[[Ep 5,21]]Brothers and sisters: be subordinate to one another out of reverence for Christ.
[[Ep 5,22]]Wives should be subordinate to their husbands as to the Lord.
[[Ep 5,23]]For the husband is head of his wife just as Christ is head of the church, he himself the savior of the body.
[[Ep 5,24]]As the church is subordinate to Christ, so wives should be subordinate to their husbands in everything.
[[Ep 5,25]]Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ loved the church and handed himself over for her
[[Ep 5,26]]to sanctify her, cleansing her by the bath of water with the word,
[[Ep 5,27]]that he might present to himself the church in splendor, without spot or wrinkle or any such thing, that she might be holy and without blemish.
[[Ep 5,28]]So (also) husbands should love their wives as their own bodies. He who loves his wife loves himself.
[[Ep 5,29]]For no one hates his own flesh but rather nourishes and cherishes it, even as Christ does the church,
[[Ep 5,30]]because we are members of his body.
[[Ep 5,31]]"For this reason a man shall leave (his) father and (his) mother and be joined to his wife, and the two shall become one flesh."
[[Ep 5,32]]This is a great mystery, but I speak in reference to Christ and the church.
[[Ep 5,33]]In any case, each one of you should love his wife as himself, and the wife should respect her husband.
